events.title: Dog Walk Fundraiser
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled walk with our furry friends! Proceeds go towards food and medical care for rescue dogs.

events.title: Adoption Day
events.description: Fall in love with your new best friend this Valentine's Day. Meet our adorable rescues looking for their forever homes.

events.title: Volunteer Meetup
events.description: Learn how you can make a difference in the lives of rescue dogs. Sign up to be a volunteer!

dogs.name: Buddy
dogs.bio: Buddy is a 3-year-old Labrador who loves playing fetch and enjoys long walks.

dogs.name: Luna
dogs.bio: Luna is a sweet 2-year-old Beagle who loves cuddles and is great with kids.

dogs.name: Max
dogs.bio: Max is a playful 1-year-old Terrier mix who loves adventures and making new friends.
